name: OR_LNLG_SURG_STAFF
description: This table contains the Surgical Staff information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Line (ORM) record

columns.name: STAFF_RTLS_OFF_YN
columns.description: Whether RTLS tracking has been manually turned off for the provider on this case log.
